title: GetLatchVarValue (Method)
text:
METHOD GetLatchVarValue : ITypedValue
Returns a ITypedValue instance, describing the current value of an optional latch variable.
This method is an enhancement/a replacement of methods IAlarm.GetLatchVar1Value and
IAlarm.GetLatchVar2Value.

rows.Name: iWhichLatchVar
rows.Comment:
The 1-based index of the latch variable. Specify 1 to obtain the same result like
method IAlarm.GetLatchVar1Value and 2 to obtain the same result like
method IAlarm.GetLatchVar2Value. All greater values correspond to the optional
additional latch variables.
